divs: sighting detailscontinue from short description....\\\\ the car we were in we were out of our mind scared then as fast as it appeared it was with the others over the dump.the car was started and we started to leave when frank who was in the back seat looked back to see all the objects come together as one and light the sky as if it was day light for a second or two.then a beam appeared on the hood of the car.the radeo was not on but made noise,and lights in the car fluttered. this was a long time ago so some of the event is not as clear as i wish it to be.i did report this to the branford ct.p.d.the next day.they were not so understanding,although i was one of many that reported the objects over the branford dump.i would take any polygraph test given to me regarding this factual story.i am 45 yrs. old now and have been holding on to this for all of this time.kinda feels good to tell it to "some" who may believe what i say is the truth.i only tell people closest to me these things. so thanks for this sight.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Branford
There were no other sightings in Branford on or around July 16th 1984
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: myself and 3 friends were at a quarry 1/4 mile fron the town dump and witnessed 4 to 5 multy colored glowing oval shapes darting back and forth and casting what looked like lazer beams at eachother. One then came at us in the blink of an eye and was above
